author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: observability
entry.content:
Join Charity Majors on the Food Fight Show as we define, discuss, and digest Observability.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Video
    • Audio

Panel

  • Nell Shamrell-Harrington github, twitter, blog
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, blog
  • Charity Majors github, twitter
  • Jamie Osler github, twitter

Upcoming Chef Events

  • ChefConf - May 22-25, Chicago, IL
  • View all upcoming events

Show Notes

  • What is Observability?
    • Monitoring, Metrics, Log Aggregation
    • Focus your energy on instrumentation, resilience to failure, and making it fast and safe to deploy and roll back.
    • Gather absolutely as much context as possible.
    • Instrumentation is just as important as unit tests.
      • Does this mean we need to reconsider the way applications are built? Do we need to start constructing observable applications? How?
    • The Business Side
  • o11y?
    • o11ycon
  • What products, or sorts of products, are gaining traction in observability?
    • Honeycomb
    • Dynatrace
  • Who are the influencers in this space?
  • What blogs, papers, books should be on my Observability reading list?
    • Reading Up on Observability and Monitoring

Picks

Nell

  • #Wargames
  • Altered Carbon

Jamie

  • Buildkite

Charity

  • Money, Power and Credibility Blog Post
  • o11ycon

Nathen

  • DevOpsDays: Baltimore
  • Sleep!

The Food Fight Show is brought to you by Nathen Harvey and Nell Shamrell with help from other hosts and the awesome community of Chefs.

The show is sponsored, in part, by Chef.

Feedback, suggestions, and questions: info@foodfightshow.com or http://github.com/foodfight/showz.

entry.title: Zookeeper, the Secret Sauce
entry.content:
Show Date: Tuesday, 12 March 2013

In this episode, we sat down with Matt Wise, Ben Hartshorne and Charity Majors to talk about using zookeeper with Chef and Puppet.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio
    • Video Stream

Watch Now

Panel

  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github
  • Charity Majors github, twitter, blog
  • Ben Hartshorne github, twitter, blog
  • Matt Wise

Show Notes

  • Matt uses kazoo
  • Matt developed zkwatcher
  • Matt's post on creating a service registry w/ zookeeper
  • Ben and Charity are using the zookeeper gem
  • Ben's blog post on distributed locks with zookeeper

Picks

Bryan

  • CS 162
  • Java is the new C

Matt Wise

  • logstash

lusis

  • Lusis is looking for someone to take over his awesome project Noah
  • Lusis presentation on Noah
